contents.text: Frank is talking with his wife Eileen in the living-room.
contents.text_zh: 弗兰克和妻子艾琳正在客厅谈话。

contents.text: Please put your cigarette out. The smoke gives me a headache.
contents.text_zh: 请把你的烟灭了，烟雾让我头疼。

contents.text: OK!OK! You know, I hate to see women sitting down all day with their heads buried in their hands.
contents.text_zh: 好！好！你知道，我讨厌看到女人整天坐着埋头忙手里的活。

contents.text: Do you want me to put my needlework away?
contents.text_zh: 你让我放下手里的针线活？

contents.text: I am putting forth a lot of effort to make this tablecloth, You always complain about whatever you see me doing. I can't put up with your constant critisism anymore.
contents.text_zh: 我花了很多精力做这个桌布，你看了我做什么总是抱怨，我再也不能忍受你无休止的批评了。

contents.text: I’m sorry, sweetie. Please forgive my bad temper. I was putting a machine together today, and I had problems with it. I'm tired. Will you please forgive me?
contents.text_zh: 对不起，亲爱的。请原谅我的坏脾气。我今天在组装一部机器，遇到了一些问题！我累了，你能原谅我吗？

contents.text: This time I will, but please don't put me down anymore.
contents.text_zh: 这次原谅你了，请你以后别贬低我。

contents.text: Honey, I've put aside some money that I earned by doing some extra mechanical work. Would you like to go out to dinner tonight, just the two of us?
contents.text_zh: 亲爱的，我存了一些做额外机械活的钱，今晚就我俩去吃晚餐，怎么样？

contents.text: How exciting!  I'll take a shower and put on my best dress. Oh, here's an advertisement for that new Italian restaurant in the shopping mall.
contents.text_zh: 好啊！我冲个澡，穿上最好的衣服。噢，这里有一张购物广场新开的意大利餐馆的广告。

contents.text: Mmm! Look at these photographs. They put me in the mood for Italian food. Would you like to try this new place?
contents.text_zh: 嗯！看看这些照片。它们使我有了吃意大利餐的心情。你想试试这个地方吗？

contents.text: Don't worry! We can manage. Payday is tomorrow!
contents.text_zh: 别担心，我们能够对付。明天发薪水。
